litespeedcache_desc: LiteSpeedCache is a hign performance cache solution for MediaWiki sites running on LiteSpeed Web Server.
litespeedcache_comment: Enable LiteSpeed LSCache Feature for MediaWiki
litespeedcache_purgecomment: You need to purge all MediaWiki Cache if you have upgraded your website, for example, changed site theme, added new extension, changed logo, etc.
litespeedcache_clearlabel: Should only be enabled for debugging purpose. Recommend turning off for production.
litespeedcache_clearcomment: Clear all Cache Log to save database space.
litespeedcache_beta: This feature is in an early testing period. If you find a problem, please disable it and send us feedback.
log-description-litespeedcache: These events track when LiteSpeed Cache action happens.
